00012 // This file implements the velocity feedback controller written by Eugene Skelton
00013 
00014 #include "DefaultController.h"
00015 #include "Matrix.h"
00016 
00017 int DefaultController::Initialize() {
00018         
00020         Matrix k(3,3);
00021         k(1,1) = 2;
00022         k(2,2) = 2;
00023         k(3,3) = 4;
00024         
00025         m_gainMatrix = k;
00026         A = FindA();
00027         MOI_sw = FindMOI_sw();
00028         
00029         return 0;
00030 }
00031 
00032 int DefaultController::Run()
00033 {
00034 
00036         Vector recentOmega_BL = m_whorl->GetOmegaBL();
00037         Matrix recentMOI = m_whorl->GetMOI();
00038         Vector Omega_s(3);/*
00039         Omega_s(1) = m_whorl->GetMomentumWheel("Wheel1")->GetWheelSpeed();
00040         Omega_s(2) = m_whorl->GetMomentumWheel("Wheel2")->GetWheelSpeed();
00041         Omega_s(3) = m_whorl->GetMomentumWheel("Wheel3")->GetWheelSpeed();*/
00042         
00044         m_controlTorque = -(skew(recentOmega_BL)*(recentMOI*recentOmega_BL+MOI_sw*Omega_s)+m_gainMatrix*recentOmega_BL);
00045 
00047         m_whorl->SetControl(m_controlTorque);
00048         
00050         SetWheelTorque(m_controlTorque);
00051 
00052         return 0;
00053 }
